issue.title: [CF 1186] Icon Scale defaults to 0 (visually)
issue.body:
http://puu.sh/mvJd5/1745107c59.jpg

v7.4.0

No matter what you set the scale to, the slider always shows a value of 0.


> Posted by CurseForge user Jalopyy | Imported from CurseForge issue #1186 | Raw

comments.body:
All the AceConfig stuff is gone in 8.0.0 ;)

I'll leave this one open until I get the beta available, at least.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
